framework.name: framework
framework.question: Looking for one stack for web, mobile & backend?
framework.description: Collection of universal UI tools and styling libraries that simplify building design systems.
framework.flyoutDescription: One codebase for web, mobile & backend

ui.name: gluestack-ui
ui.question: Want beautifully designed, accessible and universal components?
ui.description: Universal Headless & Customizable Components for React Native, Next.js, Expo & React with Optional Styling.
ui.flyoutDescription: Universal Headless & Customizable Components for React Native, Next.js, Expo & React with Optional Styling.

style.name: gluestack-style
style.question: Looking for universal and performant CSS-in-JS library?
style.description: Universal and Performant Styling Library made for React Native, Next.js, Expo & React.
style.flyoutDescription: Universal and Performant Styling library made for React Native, Next.js, Expo & React.

bolt.name: bolt
bolt.description: The Universal Project Runner for containers, child processes and even VM, all under one unified API.
bolt.flyoutDescription: The Universal Project Runner for containers, child processes and even VM, all under one unified API.

pro.name: gluestack-ui pro
pro.description: 200+ universal UI components that work across web and native platforms.
pro.flyoutDescription: 200+ universal UI components that work across web and native platforms.

gluestack.name: gluestack
gluestack.question: Looking for a full-stack framework that simplifies the process of building modern web & mobile apps?
gluestack.description: Collection of universal UI tools and styling libraries that simplify building design systems.
